name: Keys before Gold
description:
Keys before gold is a turn-based adventure game where you explore an old mine looking for gold. Throughout the journey, you will encounter many monsters that live in the deep dark mine. The deeper you go, the more gold you’ll find, but be careful, that’s where the most vicious monsters roam. 

How to play
Swipe in the direction you want to move/attack/interact.
★Tip: Sometimes you need to move a step back to advance further, spend gold to gain more later, and always remember, keys before gold!


Features
● Pixel style graphics
● Simple control, yet fast and challenging gameplay
● Endless maps to explore, gold to collect, and threats to overcome
● Variety of monsters with unique strategies
● Challenge yourself with three types of scores
